label: AB2_oC24_64_d_ef-002
title: CoGe$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
The actual stoichiometry is Co$_{7}$Ge$_{16}$, as the Co (8d) sites are 87.5\% occupied. 
 (Schubert, 1950) described this compound as being isotypic to \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_oC24_41_2a_2b-001}{PdSn$_{2}$ ($C_{e}$)} in space group $Aba2$ \#41. 
 (Cenzual, 1991) showed that the given $z$ coordinates for the cobalt atoms were consistent with space group $Cmca$ \#64. 
 Although (Schubert, 1950) give the lattice parameters in {\AA}ngstroms, (Cenzual, 1991) asserts that they were actually in kX units and converts them to {\AA}ngstroms.  We use the later values for the lattice parameters.
